mapper.select: select supplier.sup_name, supplier.sup_reg_no, material.material_name, material.material_code, quot_code, quot_no from quotation join supplier on quotation.sup_no = supplier.sup_no join material on quotation.material_no = material.material_no

select quotation.*, supplier.sup_name, supplier.sup_reg_no, material.material_name, material.material_code, material.material_raw_material, material.material_description, material.material_unit from quotation join supplier on quotation.sup_no = supplier.sup_no join material on quotation.material_no = material.material_no
AND quotation.quot_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND material.material_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND supplier.sup_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into quotation(quot_code, sup_no, quot_file, quot_dterms, quot_pterms, material_no, quot_price, quot_price_currency, quot_material_cnt, quot_material_sku, quot_due_date, quot_etc, quot_date, quot_state) values(#{quotCode},#{supNo},#{quotFile},#{quotDterms},#{quotPterms},#{materialNo},#{quotPrice},#{quotPriceCurrency}, #{quotMaterialCnt},#{quotMaterialSku},#{quotDueDate},#{quotEtc},now(),0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quotation WHERE DATE_FORMAT(quot_date, '%Y%m%d') = #{todayDate}
